message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but you get a decent amount to start with.  Hope you accept!
Your offer was quite imbalanced, Alice.  Let's be a bit more realistic. This offer recognizes the time pressure on both of us.
Okay, I see your point about a more even split.  Let's try this.  It's still a good deal for both of us, especially considering the time pressure.
